description.value:
When you provide tactical fire, you pin your foes down and seek opportunities to strike.

Prerequisites: Base attack bonus +4

Benefit: The non-ally creature chosen for your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#harrying-fire]{harrying fire} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#covering-fire]{covering fire} provokes attacks of opportunity from you due to movement as if you threatened them. When you take an attack of opportunity granted by this feat, your harrying or covering fire immediately ends and you gain no granted benefit from it on the attack.
